segments.text: Excuse me , sir , could you please tell me the way to Aidan Bookstore ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , of course.Would you like to walk there or take a bus ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Er ... Is it far from here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's just about ten minutes ' walk . Go along this street , on the third cross you'll find it on your left .
segments.speaker: S2
